content: I have an issue that I've been trying to get to the bottom of concerning a linker error when trying to compile a multithreaded program to the wasm32-unknown-emscripten target. I've documented some of what I know over at: https://github.com/gregbuchholz/thread_local_storage . Would this be something I could / should post as an issue on https://github.com/rust-lang/rust ? Or might it be better suited to https://github.com/emscripten-core/ or https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/ ? Or some other forum? Thanks!
Filing an issue on rust-lang/rust is probably fine
Thanks for the reply. I've posted it to: https://github.com/emscripten-core/emscripten/issues/15891 for now.
